patthana15.1:6.1: Hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:6.2: Nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:6.3: Hetuṃ kusalañca nahetuṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi (cittasamuṭṭhānameva, ārammaṇaṃ natthi.)
patthana15.1:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:9.1: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana15.1:10.1: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:11.1: Nahetu kusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:12.1: Hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:13.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye tīṇi, jhāne ekaṃ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:15.1: Hetuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana15.1:16.1: Nahetuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana15.1:17.1: Hetuṃ akusalañca nahetuṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:17.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:19.1: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana15.1:20.1: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:21.1: Nahetu akusalo dhammo nanahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:22.1: Hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammā nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:23.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye tīṇi, jhāne ekaṃ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:25.1: Nahetuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
